productInformation.value: #93,153 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #559 in Manual Toothbrushes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT !!! Sooooo Soft !!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical because these are not "silko" brand but I ordered anyway. We needed new toothbrushes anyway and the price was right. These toothbrushes are so soft. To touch them they feel soft like petting a soft cat, I can't think of anything else to compare the softness to. And brushing with it, there was no pain brushing and no bleeding from my gums. I like soft bristle toothbrushes anyway. But this was even softer. And after I finished brushing, my teeth are whiter. I feel cleaner. That cleaner feeling may be due to the fact that because the brush was so soft and no pain I brushed for a longer time. I used to be a dental assistant and in many of the CE courses (continuing education), that your required to take yearly as a dental assistant, it was mentioned that a soft bristle toothbrush is recommended. If brushing is not painful it will promote better brushing habits. And soft bristle is better for gum tissue. So I LOVE this toothbrush, I HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for after snack brushing or for sensitive gums
reviews.reviewText: These brushes are excellent for a short travel when you may not want to pack the weight of an electric toothbrush. They are also good for sensitive gums and if one pays attention to getting under the gum instructions from you hygenist these brushes are great for that too. 6 of them makes the price good even though you go through each brush faster than the usual type.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice! Would purchase again.
reviews.reviewText: First day using it after getting it, it is a bit bulky for my tastes but that was my own fault for not reading the description. A bit of warning for those of you you are texture sensitive like myself, it does feel very odd at first, kinda like brushing your teeth with toilet paper, but it’s something I think I can get used to. It definitely is very soft and gave the outside a nice scrub that took off the gunk very easily. I don’t think it does too well for deep in the grooves so just make sure to floss very well. It also is so incredibly thick that I had a tough time getting rid of all water out of it after I was done, having to squeeze the brush to get it out. I was worried the grip was gonna be too slippery as it looked very shiny and too smooth in the picture, but it holds very well in your hand and doesn’t slip at all. I can’t speak for any whitening effects yet but it definitely seems worth the buy so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for sensitive teeth
reviews.reviewText: I've been having trouble finding a good toothbrush since I have sensitive gums and these work perfectly! My teeth feel so clean afterwards and I love the design!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Head is too chunky
reviews.reviewText: Love the bristles but the head is too chunky/wide for a narrow mouth, ran into my gum and gave myself a sore. A tapered narrower head would be a good option. Other than that the bristles don't poke and hurt my gums and I have sensitive teeth and they are happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For that extra gentle cleaning
reviews.reviewText: Simple and serve their purpose. I would say they are too soft and dense for my personal preference. Given that there are so many bristles it feels almost like brushing your teeth with more of a microfiber cloth than.. an actual brush. Super gentle texture and cleans all the same.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Tooth Brushes
reviews.reviewText: Awesome Tooth Brushes especially if you have sensitive gums and teeth!! They clean well, do not hurt my teeth or gums and is perfect. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dental assistant dissatisfied
reviews.reviewText: I am a certified dental assistant and i can reassure you these toothbrushes do NOT clean your teeth. The bristles are too soft to be abrasive enough to clean plaque or tarter from your teeth. and the amount of bristles on the brush are so many and so compact that they do not spread to clean in between the teeth. had bad breath after 2 days use. do not buy.
If you have sensitive teeth, and gums, these toothbrushes are great. The only thing is the handle is too thin for me, and also a little short. But I do like the softness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 2, 2021
reviews.reviewText: These are really good if you brush your teeth too hard. I noticed my gums much better after just a month
Impossible de se brosser le dents correctement... Texture très très , trop souple.
